comments.body: Should there be assertions that strategy implements `RESTUpdateStrategy` etc here?
compiler would catch it when assigned at https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/pull/7419/files#diff-b9cf9c3ecb5fce05f0eb0ee398d2ed0fR61

That's fair, though those assertions are really more for humans reading the
code than the compiler.
